item.title: Underage Gambling
item.author: peter@mackenziebasaraba.ca (Peter MacKenzie-Basaraba)
item.description: In the heat of the CS:GO gambling controversy, I blew eleven loons on a Dragon Doppler Skinhub case. I sat there on my 14th birthday, hypnotized, mouth agape as ludicrously expensive JPEG files danced across my screen; against all conceivable odds, I took home a Factory-New Dragon Lore.
